pkgmetadata.longdescription: Siag is an old-school office package that needs only some X11 libs. It doesn't rely on modern graphical toolkits like gtk+ or Qt, so it is well suited for old, less capable hardware. You should be aware, though, that it is unmaintained, and it may compile just fine, but it might not run. The modern X11 software stack has simply passed Siag by, so the way Siag wants to do things may not work on your system.
